casename: Wu Tze Kok v Public Prosecutor
counsel: Appellant in person; Ravneet Kaur (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Sentencing/Imprisonment in default of payment of fines/Power of court to impose default imprisonment/Whether power extends to refunding fine already paid and allowing default sentence to be served instead/s 224(b)(iv), (e) & (f) Criminal Procedure Code (Cap 68)/s 19(a) Supreme Court of Judicature Act (Cap 322, 1999 Ed)
